docs.snippet: The Islamic State group on Sunday repelled an advance by U.S.-backed forces on one of its main bastions in northern Syria, seizing back territory it had previously lost, Syrian activists and the extremist group said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Islamic State group on Sunday repelled an advance by U.S.-backed forces on one of its main bastions in northern Syria, seizing back territory it had previously lost, Syrian activists and the extremist group said.

headline.main: IS Repels US-Backed Forces Advancing on Syria Bastion
headline.print_headline: IS Repels US-Backed Forces Advancing on Syria Bastion

docs.snippet: Concern about immigration and a wish for stricter border controls were important factors in Britain's vote to leave the European Union last week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Concern about immigration and a wish for stricter border controls were important factors in Britain's vote to leave the European Union last week.

headline.main: France Eyes Prospects to Pressure Britain Over Migrants
headline.print_headline: France Eyes Prospects to Pressure Britain Over Migrants

docs.snippet: Climate change is threatening the livelihoods of the people of tiny Kiribati, and even the island nation’s existence. The government is making plans for the island’s demise....
docs.lead_paragraph: Climate change is threatening the livelihoods of the people of tiny Kiribati, and even the island nation’s existence. The government is making plans for the island’s demise.
docs.abstract: Tidal surge which swept through Kiribati in 2015 is heightening alarms from scientists that climate change will soon make low-lying island nation uninhabitable; former Pres Anote Tong, whose administration created potential refuge in Fiji and has been encouraging job-skilled residents to emigrate, says his country's plight is worldwide climate wake-up call and its impact is very real.

headline.main: A Remote Pacific Nation, Threatened by Rising Seas
headline.print_headline: Remote Pacific Nation, Threatened by Rising Seas
